description: Skateboarding legend Tony Hawk recently revealed he has been "talking to Activision again" about launching a game based on the Pro Skater franchise. Read more...
title: Tony Hawk says he has been "talking to Activision again" for something Pro Skater-related

description: Early tests integrating the OpenAI o1-preview with GitHub Copilot show that it can quickly debug hard performance bugs, suggest more sophisticated algorithms than before, and compute metrics. Read more...
title: GitHub Copilot integrates OpenAI's o1 to streamline complex coding problems

description: Google has expanded access to Gemini Live, which is now available for free to all Android users. The feature allows for natural back-and-forth conversations with Gemini via voice. Read more...
title: Google opens up Gemini Live voice chat to all Android users for free

description: Customers who are signed up for Microsoft Teams Preview can try out a new feature that offers bidirectional translation support. Read more...

description: This week, Apple announced a new Hearing Aid feature for the AirPods Pro 2 to boost audio for people with hearing loss. The feature has been approved by the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA). Read more...
title: FDA approves Apple AirPods Pro hearing aid feature

description: OpenAI has just announced its latest AI model, OpenAI o1, which has been designed to help solve more complex problems and tasks. Read more...

description: Microsoft has offered a summary of some new ideas for boosting Windows security and updates in the near and far term after July's faulty Crowdstrike software update. Read more...
title: Microsoft reveals ideas to improve Windows security updates after the Crowdstrike incident

description: Frontier Developments is releasing Planet Coaster 2 in just a couple of months, bringing its new water park features, better customizations, and more over the original park builder experience. Read more...

description: People who have personal accounts to use Microsoft's Clipchamp video editor can now access content based on games like Minecraft and Sea of Thieves. Read more...

description: According to Guinness World Records, Garry's Mod has made history by breaking the record for the best-selling exclusive PC game of all time. Read more...

description: Unity has revealed that it has immediately removed the Runtime Fee for using its graphics engine for game developers. However, it is increasing overall fees for some customers. Read more...

description: Respawn Entertainment's Star Wars Jedi: Survivor is now free of Denuvo DRM. The latest update brings major performance improvements and fixes for FPS hitching to the PC version too. Read more...

description: CD Projekt Red released a new update for Cyberpunk 2077, finally delivering long-awaited frame generation and AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution 3 support. Read more...

description: In a new test, Apple's latest iPhone 16 Pro models were found to offer faster 5G speeds compared to their predecessors, thanks to a new modem. Read more...

description: Flappy Bird, an insanely popular mobile game from 2013, is making a surprising comeback. Revived and upgraded, it is coming soon to iOS and Android. Read more...

description: Microsoft is now rolling out a new start screen for SharePoint users. Its streamlined design should make it easier to create news posts and articles. Read more...

description: Good news for older Pixel phone owners as it is spotted that the company is working to bring the Reimagine and Auto Frame feature to older Pixel phones. Read more...

description: Toshiba's lineup of NAS-optimized hard drives is currently offering the 14TB model with a massive 47% discount. Read more...

description: Ofcom expands One Touch Switch rules, allowing easier broadband and phone switching. This move aims to enhance competition and could lead to lower prices for consumers. Read more...

description: The Nvidia GeForce NOW cloud gaming service is adding nine more PC games this week, and will add the upcoming Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster next week. Read more...

description: Microsoft 365 services like Teams, Outlook, and more are currently down, the tech giant has confirmed. Read more...

description: An internal email from the CEO of Microsoft Gaming, Phil Spencer, sent to Xbox employees says 650 jobs are being cut. Read more...
title: Further 650 Xbox employees are being let go from "corporate and supporting functions"

description: Rumors that the iPhone 16 series would get faster charging speeds turned out to be true. All four models now support up to 45W wired charging. Read more...
title: Apple bumps iPhone 16 and 16 Pro charging speeds to 45W

description: If your computer is powered by the first or second-gen AMD Ryzen or AMD Ryzen Threadripper processor, you can no longer use the latest Ryzen Master software. Read more...

description: The 13.8-inch Surface Laptop 7 with the Snapdragon X Plus processor and 512GB SSD is now available with a $197 discount. Read more...

description: Microsoft has announced it is killing off Windows legacy DRM support on Windows 8, Windows 7, Silverlight, and legacy Windows Media Player. Read more...
title: Microsoft kills legacy DRM support on Windows Media Player, Windows 7/ 8, Silverlight

description: Microsoft has released a new firmware update for the Surface Pro X tablets to address problems with camera crashes and non-working keyboards in WinRE. Read more...
title: Surface Pro X gets fixes for camera crashes and WinRE bugs

description: In the ongoing antitrust lawsuit filed by the U.S. DOJ, evidence has revealed statements by a former Google exec who openly said that the company's strategy would be to "crush" the ad competition. Read more...

description: This week's Edge Dev update brings improvements to the Appearance settings section and various fixes. Read more...

description: Samsung announced the beginning of mass production of 9th-generation QLC NAND memory for the next-gen SSDs with higher density, bigger capacity, and lower energy consumption. Read more...

description: Billionaire Jared Isaacman and SpaceX employee Sarah Gillis are preparing for the all-civilian spacewalk and testing new spacesuits. Read more...

description: Amazon US is currently offering the 960GB Kingston A400 SATA 3 Internal SSD at its lowest price in over 9 months, so grab one for yourself while stocks last. Read more...

description: WhatsApp Android Beta is spotted developing a feature that will let you add people and group chats to lists easily and quickly, saving you time. Read more...

description: Get ready to be bombarded with ads, as more users watching YouTube on smart TVs are seeing ads even when they pause a video. Read more...

description: Thanks to Starlink's satellites, T-Mobile users will soon receive emergency alerts on their phones even without cell service. Read more...
